article.title: ChemImage to Provide Explosive Detection Technology
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ChemImage Bio Threat LLC, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, was awarded a $7,079,258 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract modification to supply early user test systems to be used in the detection of homemade explosives. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
